title: Will i get my end of season boarder with dishonorable honor?
body:
I'am toxic, and i admit that, but sometimes keeping your mouth shut to people isnt possible for me and im trying to get better. But all i really want, because i never care about the skin, is my boarder, getting d4 this season felt really good. and if i dont get that because i typed stuff. Thats depressing to me..

Please solid answers, dont guess.. Thanks <3

replies.body: Like, negativity will always be a thing and yes. People can be way to negative and even int or afk, and that deserves punishment. but banter with another person, to then take away what myself and MANY others have been working for, seems so incredibly stupid. and naturally the only people to agree with me is level 1 and below honors, and people to disagree is any one above that. The honor system to me, is just stupid, and a useless mechanic which helps nothing,  at all. People will be toxic, and thats how its going to be.
i feel like getting punished for verbal toxicity should only lower your honor 2 or 3 tiers down, not all the way to honor 0

Don't first offenses for chat misbehavior drop your Honor to Level 1, and then afterwards to Level 0? 'Cause I've seen a fair few people mention that they've been dropped to Honor Level 1 from wherever for getting punished, so your wish seems to have been true the whole time.
but you dont get rewards if youre below level 2. and i read an article that it took a guy 4 months, to honor level up once

And I've seen two separate posts where people have regained Honor Level 2 quickly. One took 5 months from Honor 0, and one took 2-3 months from Honor Level 1.

Both of those players reformed and made the effort to be a positive force in their matches. I can guarantee you that the guy who took 4~ months to level up once was not quite so positive.

If you're honor 1 and have all checkpoints and are on the verge of getting to honor 2, then yes you will get the ranked rewards if you can get to honor 2 by the last day of the season. However, if you don't end the season with honor 2 or higher, you are ineligible for ranked rewards.

Nope.

All Riot wants from you is to follow the rules.
But you didn't give them that, so they're denying you yours.
guarantee you're honor 2 or above

Indeed. Always been above 2 since last year.
Because I enjoy all the rewards.

Also, I really dislike seeing a game ruined due to someone's attitude.
I've been playing this game for 10 years, I've learned from perceptive, the game is a lot less fun when you get into the negative aspect of the game. That's dealing with players intentionally feeding, not being productive, not being active to help the team because they're far too busy fighting with other players. When an argument starts in the game, players tend to give up and much rather end the game just so they can report people. 

So yea, not only being toxic leads to nothing but ending with a ban, it can lead people to lose a lot more games. Double negative. Not worth it. So I much rather see players follow the rules as I do, so we can just enjoy the game. I'd much rather encourage players to win or keep any negative thoughts to myself in games. So I can take any advantage to win and make the game enjoyable for myself as much as possible.

You must be Honor level 2 at the end of the season.  If you're not Honor level 2+, you will be ineligible for the end of season rewards, including Ranked rewards like borders.

don't listen to people saying you don't have enought time.

And it doesn't matter, its ultimately up to the people to vote for the honor, and the only way ive noticed to get honor in diamond, is to carry everyone ass. And even then isnt every game.
